entry.title: Future of Atomic Multi-path Payments (AMP)?
entry.summary: Jozef is working on a project that uses LND with Atomic Multi-path Payments (AMP) invoices. He has found out that no mobile lightning wallet is able to send sats to AMP invoices, which makes him wonder about the future of AMP. Jozef is curious whether AMP is a dead-end or can make it to standard, and if there are any other lightning implementations that support it.
